column6:
"BARRACUDA",2006,7
Dermot and Alice have got a big problem. He weighs 300-pounds -- give or take a severed body part or two, incurred during his recent skirmish with the Punisher. He goes by the name of Barracuda. And he wants some payback. If the villainous pair is going to have any chance at survival, then their only hope just might be the man they tried to kill in the first place. Part 5 (of 6).
32 PGS./Explicit Content ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Tim Bradstreet | colorist:Giulia Brusco | writer:Garth Ennis | letterer:Randy Gentile | penciller:Goran Parlov
